publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3359 Mr John McAllion: Safe Child Scheme-That the Parliament welcomes the Safe Child Scheme launched in Milton of Craigie Retail Park, Dundee; notes that the use of contact cards allows a lost child to be reunited with his or her parents quickly, and further notes that this is part of a wider scheme aimed at providing a safe environment for the community in the east end of Dundee.

S1M-3359 Mr John McAllion: Safe Child Scheme-That the Parliament welcomes the Safe Child Scheme launched in Milton of Craigie Retail Park, Dundee; notes that the use of contact cards allows a lost child to be reunited with his or her parents quickly, and further notes that this is part of a wider scheme aimed at providing a safe environment for the community in the east end of Dundee.
S1M-3359 Safe Child Scheme (lodged on 5 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3359 Safe Child Scheme (lodged on 5 September 2002) Helen Eadie*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3359 Safe Child Scheme (lodged on 5 September 2002) Scott Barrie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3359 Safe Child Scheme (lodged on 5 September 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3359 Safe Child Scheme (lodged on 5 September 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
